summary: Adds a bunch of spears to skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-3-1369282552.png[/img]
Hey guys!
This mod adds spears based on original weapon types(daedric, ebony, dwarven, etc), both ranged & melee.
all of these are craftable. melee spears are enchantable, & upgrading works.

List of spears:-
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-2-1369282523.png[/img]
RANGED Axe
RANGED Daedric
RANGED Dwarven
RANGED Ebony
RANGED Elven
RANGED Hammer-fell
RANGED Orcish
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-1-1369282552.png[/img]
Daedric Battle-Spear
Daedric War-Spear
Dwarven Battle-Spear
Dwarven War-Spear
Ebony Battle-Spear
Ebony War-Spear
Elven Battle-Spear
Elven War-Spear
Hammer-fell Battle-Spear
Hammer-fell War-Spear
Orcish Battle-Spear
Orcish War-Spear
Falmer Battle-Spear *new*
Falmer War-spear *new*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-3-1369282523.png[/img]
RANGED Axe (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Daedric (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Dwarven (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Ebony (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Elven (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Hammerfell (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Orcish (BOLT) *new*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-4-1369282524.png[/img]
Dwemer Spear Launcher *new*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-2-1369282552.png[/img]
The Secrets Of the Dwemer *new*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This time, i have added spears in bolt form, ie, can be fired from crossbows, but i have made a \"dwemer Spear Launcher\"(see images) to fire bollt spears, for better looks.

like i said, all of these are craftable. melee spears are enchantable,& upgrading works.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-5-1369282524.png[/img]
*Crafting issues - Categories are fixed
*crafting issues - Crafting Battle Spears is now possible
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36242-1-1369282523.png[/img]
MELEE:
Falmer Battle-Spear *new*
Falmer War-spear *new*

BOLTS:
RANGED Axe (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Daedric (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Dwarven (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Ebony (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Elven (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Hammerfell (BOLT) *new*
RANGED Orcish (BOLT) *new*

CROSSBOWS:
Dwemer Spear Launcher *new*

QUEST: 
The Secrets Of the Dwemer *new*
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
\'


PS: the secrets of the dwemer is a quest i made, to add value to my mod.NOTE: YOU CANNOT CRAFT BOLT SPEARS OR SPEAR LAUNCHERS UNTIL YOU COMPLETE THE QUEST..the quest is started by going to the dwemer museum and reading the pamphlet near the spear launcher.
i dont want to spoil the rest of the quest for you, but if you need help completing it,
check this video.
[youtube]c8y1k39qKXs[/youtube]

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i recommend using these mods with mine:

(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35929//?) For Stabbing Power Attack
(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24286/?) For the stabbing animations on horseback. 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Daren
